section2.title: Uses Power in Urban Scenarios / Generates Power in Long Distance Scenarios / Supplies Power in Outdoor Scenarios

section3.title: Your Home on Wheels with More Space and Luxury
section3.subtitle: Redefining the Full-Size Flagship SUV

list1.title: The First Flawless Halo Light
list1.subtitle: The brand-new Halo Ring Headlight is more than 2 meters long, without any breakpoints in the middle. The Halo light represents a ring of happiness surrounding a home.

list2.title: Elegant Silhouette
list2.subtitle: Thanks to a clean design, Li L9 stands out with a refined side profile featuring flush door handles with anti-freeze protection.

section5.title: A Comfortable Living Space
section5.subtitle: Extra-large space and flagship-level seats for every family member

list1.title: Fully Electric Seats in All Three Rows
list1.subtitle: All six seats come standard with heating. First and second row seats are equipped with a ventilation feature and support a 10-point massage to shake off the travel fatigue.

list2.title: The First 4-Way Electric Leg Rest
list2.subtitle: The right seat in the second row is designed with a four-way electric leg rest to provide you with a first-class experience.

title3.title: Nappa Leather Seats
title3.subtitle: All seats feature comfortable 3D sponge and Nappa leather with a perfect wraparound fit and feeling.

title4.title: 4-Seat Nap Mode
title4.subtitle: All four seats in the first and second rows support Nap Mode. Enjoy a comfortable lunch break or get energized while waiting for the kids to get out of school.

list1.title: 256-Color Ambient Lighting
list1.subtitle: The ambient lighting creates a cozy, welcoming atmosphere for all passengers.

list2.title: Smart Climate Control With Air Purification and Fragrance System
list2.subtitle: Provide fresh and pleasant air for your family.

list3.title: Two-pane panoramic sunroof
list3.subtitle: The panoramic sunroof lets more sunlight in, making you feel at home.

list1.title: Double-Layered, Noise Insulating Glass
list1.subtitle: Double-layered noise insulating glass for both windows and panoramic sunroof, contributing to a quiet trip.

list2.title: Silent Electric Suction Doors Come Standard
list2.subtitle: Doors feature a silent design, keeping the family free from disturbance while resting. Easy to close even in narrow spaces.

list1.title: Dual Wireless Charging Pads in the First Row
list1.subtitle: The charging pads are specially designed to provide higher charging power for various brands of phones.

list2.title: Sunken Storage Compartment
list2.subtitle: A convenient place to store your bags, shoes and other carry-on items.

list3.title: Second-Row Right Side Folding Table
list3.subtitle: Your work desk, dining tray or toy table on the road.

list4.title: Rear Refrigerator
list4.subtitle: Accommodates up to 10 cans of coke or 1 bottle of champagne. Supports refrigerating and heating with variable temperature settings.

list1.title: Luggage Will Never Be a Problem.
list1.subtitle: Trunk space of 242L can hold luggage for all when the third-row seats are in use.

list2.title: One-Button Electric Folding & Unfolding for the Third Row
list2.subtitle: Quickly fold the third row for even larger trunk space.

list3.title: More Space for Luggage With the Third Row Folded
list3.subtitle: The trunk space comes to 640L with the third row folded. Bring your camping equipment, skis and bicycle with you anywhere.

section11.title: A Smart Living Space
section11.subtitle: Li SS Max+ Smart Space,Li L9 supports 3D Spatial Interaction from 5 screens, coming standard with a 4D immersive audio and video system.

list1.title: Innovative Combination of HUD and Safe Driving Touch-Bar Display
list1.subtitle: The 13.3-inch HD HUD renders smart driving and trip information in easy view.

list2.title: Center Display and Copilot Entertainment Display
list2.subtitle: Two 15.7-inch top-level OLED screens: Center Information Display integrates functions such as navigation, music, and application center; 16:9 screen ratio. The co-pilot display let's you watch your favorite dramas in stunning quality.

list3.title: Rear Entertainment Display
list3.subtitle: This electronically controlled 15.7-inch OLED screen is designed for second and third-row passengers with adjustable viewing angles.

section13.title: 3D Spatial Interaction
section13.subtitle: The 3D ToF sensor and six-distributed microphone array make interaction possible from any seat with gesture, voice, or touch. Feel free to choose the way you find most comfortable.

list1.title: Innovative 7.3.4 Panoramic Audio System
list1.subtitle: The Panoramic Audio System coming standard incorporates 21 speakers and a power amplifier with a maximum power of 2160W provides a concert-like experience in the vehicle.

list2.title: Second-Row 4D Vibration
list2.subtitle: The second-row seats with provide 4D vibration, together with the audio system and dynamic ambient lighting, give you an immersive experience never imagined before in a vehicle.

list1.title: Dual 8155 Chips
list1.subtitle: Two Snapdragon 8155 chips, along with 24 GB RAM and 256 GB ROM, provide superb computing power for AI, software, and entertainment.

list2.title: Dual 5G Carrier
list2.subtitle: Fast Internet access is always available for watching HD online videos smoothly in the vehicle. During signal blind spots for one carrier, the other one can be switched to quickly.

list1.title: App Center for Your Family
list1.subtitle: We have it covered. Play songs, do karaoke, watch movies, and listen to audio books. Installation or deletion of apps on one screen, syncs to all three screens automatically.

list2.title: Smart Accessories
list2.subtitle: Li store offers smart accessories that can connect to the vehicle, including microphones and child safety seats. They can also be easily managed in the CID interface.

section17.title: A Living Space on Wheels.
section17.subtitle: Our self-developed flagship-level range extender system and chassis control system produce a CLTC combined range of 1,323 km and a WLTC combined range of 1,108 km.

list1.title: 1.5T Four-Cylinder Range Extender
list1.subtitle: The 1.5T four-cylinder range extender allows for up to 40.5% thermal efficiency, less operating noise, reduced energy consumption, featuring a CLTC fuel consumption as low as 5.9 L/100 km.

list2.title: Flame-Retardant Battery Pack
list2.subtitle: With a capacity of 44.5 kWh, the battery pack enables a CLTC pure electric range of 223 km and a WLTC pure electric range of 188 km.

list3.title: Front and Rear Motor 4WD
list3.subtitle: With a maximum drive power of 330 kW and torque of 620 Nm, L9 sprints from 0 to 100 km/h in just 5.3 seconds, maintaining power performance even when it is fully loaded.

list4.title: Self-Developed XCU Central Domain Controller
list4.subtitle: The controller processes complex vehicle information rapidly and controls systems in the vehicle precisely in milliseconds.

section19.title: Li Auto Magic Carpet Air Suspension
section19.subtitle: The Magic Carpet Air Suspension combines a double-wishbone front suspension, five-link rear suspension, smart air suspension, continuous damping control, self-developed XCU central domain controller, and millisecond-level control algorithms. This enables Li L9 to improve the ride stability and comfort on all road conditions.

list1.title: Легкий вход и выход
list1.subtitle: The vehicle can be lowered by 40 mm to make it easy for the elderly and children to get on and off.

list2.title: Loading Mode
list2.subtitle: The rear suspension can be automatically lowered by 50 mm, making it easier to load large objects into the trunk.

list3.title: Speed-Dependent Adjustment
list3.subtitle: Variable suspension height adapts to driving speed, reducing energy consumption while improving driving stability.

list4.title: Off-Road Assist
list4.subtitle: Suspension can be automatically raised for more ground clearance, increasing off-road maneuverability.

list1.title: 3.5kW Power Source
list1.subtitle: Toast bread or barbecue beef. Cook freely with electricity as you would at home.

list2.title: A Variety of Power Sockets
list2.subtitle: Li L9 offers six Type-C ports, two 12V sockets, and one 220V socket for laptops and other devices.

section22.title: A Safe Living Space.
section22.subtitle: Self developed Full-Stack Li AD autonomous driving system.

list1.title: AD Max Autonomous Driving Sensor
list1.subtitle: AD Max comes standard with an advanced smart driving system, creating a 3D digital driving experience in real time.

list2.title: AD Pro Autonomous Driving Sensor
list2.subtitle: 360° omni-directional sensing allows for a further, wider, and clearer vision.

list1.title: AD Max Autonomous Driving Chips
list1.subtitle: Two NVIDIA Orin-X processors with a total computing power of 508 TOPS efficiently process fused signals from sensors in real-time, for more powerful data processing and computing.

list2.title: AD Pro Autonomous Driving Chips
list2.subtitle: Li Auto AD Pro is the world's first mass-produced smart driving system equipped with Horizon Robotics Journey™ 5® chip. Advanced BPU® Bayes AI accelerated engine delivers a hashrate of 128 Tops.

section25.title: Some feature will be available on Max models through OTA5.0 update, and will be rolled out successively on Pro and Air models through OTA updates.

list1.title: Highway NOA
list1.subtitle: This feature enables the vehicle to avoid roadwork obstacles, change lanes in multi-vehicle scenarios, autonomously overtake, adjust speed, and enter/exit ramps based on the sub-meter high-precision positioning capability.

list2.title: LCC
list2.subtitle: Automatically follows vehicle ahead and drives steadily in the center of lane, for a worry free journey during traffic jams and long-distance driving.

list3.title: AEB
list3.subtitle: This feature has been optimized for Chinese roads, especially crossing pedestrians, two-wheelers, and tricycles, minimizing the chance of accidents.

list4.title: Intelligent parking
list4.subtitle: The brand new BEV parking perception architecture enables the vehicle to support AVP across multiple floors and remote parking in tight spots.

section26.title: Li AD Max features automotive-grade high-resolution 128-line LiDAR and self-developed radar algorithms to better identify abnormal obstacles and construction scenarios for a safer ride.

list1.title: Identifies Close Cut-in Scenarios
list1.subtitle: AD Max can identify close cut-in scenarios, including both slow cut-in trucks and fast cut-in vehicles.

list2.title: Identifies abnormal vehicle accidents on the road.
list2.subtitle: Identifies road accidents with no obvious vehicle characteristics, including dim scenes at night.

list3.title: Identities Construction Roadblocks
list3.subtitle: AD Max can identify construction roadblocks such as traffic cones, anti-collision buckets, and water-filled barriers and brake in an emergency.

list1.title: Powerful and Reliable Steering Wheel
list1.subtitle: This steering wheel offers the most comprehensive range of safety assistance features with 4-way electric control, capacitive sensing, and vibration warning.

list2.title: Fatigue Monitoring and Attention Warning System
list2.subtitle: This system keeps the driver focused on the road ahead and uses the smart driving functions correctly.

list3.title: Sound Field Detection Enables an Early Warning System.
list3.subtitle: The sound field detection feature warns about risks all around the vehicle, so the driver can respond quickly.

section28.title: Fortress Protection System™ provide 360° protections
section28.subtitle: It provides all-round protection capabilities from the body structure, battery and airbags. High-strength steel accounts for >75% of the body-in-white, 12 positions are protected with airbags and curtain airbags throughout the vehicle. The safety of the body is high, and the maneuverability and comfort of the vehicle are good. High vehicle safety, Good vehicle maneuverability and comfort.

list1.title: Sturdy Vehicle Structure.
list1.subtitle: A high strength steel and thermo-formed steel ratio of over 75%, coupled with dual aluminum alloy front anti-collision beams, allows Li L9 to break down the front impact and protect driver and riders.

list2.title: Dual battery pack protection.
list2.subtitle: Side protective beam and aluminum alloy shell can keep the battery pack safe even in the demanding side pole and chassis impact tests.

list3.title: Flagship Airbag Layout.
list3.subtitle: Li L9 stands out with airbags covering 12 positions throughout the vehicle, featuring 2 front and 2 side airbags for the first row, 2 side airbags for the second row, and curtain airbags on both sides running through all three rows.

list1.title: Lights for Safety
list1.subtitle: Run-through halo headlights boast better lighting effects. Along with Adaptive LED headlights, driving Li L9 at night becomes safer.

list2.title: Sentry Mode
list2.subtitle: In the sentry mode, Li L9 can perceive the cockpit and monitor the surrounding environment in real-time.

list3.title: Flagship Safety Redundancy
list3.subtitle: AD Max comes standard with Level 4 safety redundancy, which features steering redundancy, braking redundancy, and power supply redundancy, to ensure the model's safety and reliability in combination with LiDAR and its strong computing power.

section31.title: Safeguard the Health of Your Family
section31.subtitle: Li L9 is the only large SUV model that has received all five-star ratings in the four tests of the China-Automobile Health Index (C-AHI), setting the highest total score in history under the new rules and the highest total score in 2022. Test model: Li L9 Max.

item1.title: Volatile Organic Compound Vehicle Odor Intensity

card3.title: Nappa leather steering wheel comes standard with heating and 4-way electric control

card5.title: Independent audio system for the front passenger

card8.title: Electric adjustment and memory of side mirrors

card14.title: Double-layered noise and heat insulating sunroof glass

section34.title: Learn more about the Li SS smart space and Li AD Pilot Assistance

list1.title: Li Smart Space
list1.subtitle: SS Max+
list1.text: Equipped with dual Qualcomm Snapdragon 8155 chips The 5-Screen 3D Spatial Interaction system (HUD, Safe Driving Touch-Bar Display, and three 15.7'' OLED displays in front and rear rows). Besides, coming standard with a 4D immersive audio and video system.

list2.title: Li Pilot Assistance
list2.subtitle: AD Max
list2.text: Li AD Max Smart Driving boasts of dual Nvidia Orin-X chips, LiDAR, and a complete set of autonomous driving safety redundancy system, making smart driving in all scenarios possible.

list3.title: Li Pilot Assistance
list3.subtitle: AD Pro
list3.text: Li AD Pro is the world's first mass-produced autonomous driving system equipped with Horizon Robotics Journey™ 5 chip. It ensures a safe, comfortable, and fast NOA experience.
